org.diirt.datasource.timecache

Class PVCacheImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.datasource.timecache.PVCacheImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PVCache, DataStorageListener

    public class PVCacheImpl
extends Object
implements PVCache, DataStorageListener
    PVCache first implementation. Handles the communication between a list of sources, a storage and registered queries threw PVCacheListener. Manages a list of requested intervals which are intersected with new requested TimeInterval. Manages a list a completed intervals which is the result of the concatenation of the lists of completed intervals per sources. When data is lost from storage, the IntervalsList generated from the TimestampsSet is subtracted to all requested/completed intervals lists.
    Author:
    Fred Arnaud (Sopra Group) - ITER
